resources.string: Before you start learning new things about our planet and answering questions about geography, let\'s talk about the rules.\nThe game has tests of varying difficulty. Don\'t worry if you forgot everything that was said at school, you will quickly get used to the easy levels and be able to solve more difficult ones.
For each test you have three hearts. For each error, one of them is removed, which means that after the third error, the test will be terminated. But don\'t worry, you can always replay it.
And there\'s also a timer. Each question has a specific time limit. If you are late at least once, the test will fail, but I am sure that you will have time to do everything!
As long as you obtain 6th level,\nyou are about to achieve the key of medium levels
As long as you obtain 6th level,\nyou are about to achieve the key of insane levels
As long as you obtain 6th level,\nyou are about to teach others!
These tasks could be solved even by my 4th year old child
This level represents that you are able to teach others, because lack of people could solve this LVLs
TRY YOURSELF and solve the most complicated tasks of geography nowadays
